title: Creamy Cabbage Coleslaw
directions: Combine cabbage, red onion, carrot and parsley in large bowl. Set aside.

To make the dressing: Add sour cream, Dijon, apple cider vinegar, 2 tbsp. mayonnaise, honey, celery seeds to small bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Whisk to combine. If desired, whisk in 1 more tbsp. of mayonnaise.
Toss dressing with salad. Taste and adjust for seasoning.
Let stand for 15 to 20 minutes in refrigerator before serving to allow flavours to marry.
ingredients: 6 cups savoy cabbage (about 1/2 head), thinly sliced or shredded
Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
